Html:
Hi there,

i am configured on our WPP Server a Package to install Java 8 Update 112. I followed the documentation from https://wsuspackagepublisher.codeplex.com/documentation, but the specifierd clients not showing this update.
We havent before published Java via WPP. The Updatelog from the client dont show any errors or infos.
Anyone have a hint for me?
If you need further information pls let me know.

Greetings
